title: Quinoa Tofu Kale Bowl
steps: Combine vegetable broth, quinoa, and chili powder. Bring to a boil uncovered, then  cover and simmer until quinoa is cooked, about 20 minutes.
Heat 2 T of the oil in a large non-stick pan over high heat. Fry the tofu, tossing regularly to brown sides evenly.
Heat 1 T of the oil in a different pan over medium heat. Add the onion, curry powder, and chickpeas, and fry for about 12 minutes.
Combine the Greek yogurt, water, and Salsa Lizano to make the sauce.
On a bed of kale, serve the quinoa, chickpeas and onion, and fried tofu. Top with sauce.
